sentence: In Wyoming, a slew of candidates dropped out after he announced his support for Harriet Hageman's bid against a top Trump critic, Rep. Liz Cheney.
author: Jill Colvin
title: Donald Trump turns to endorsements to keep bending GOP to his will

sentence: LEADING THE DAY POLITICS: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) on Thursday endorsed Harriet Hageman, the primary challenger looking to unseat Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report - One day, two continents, words of war

sentence: EXCLUSIVE: Harriet Hageman, the leading Republican candidate challenging Rep. Liz Cheney as Wyoming's at-large member of the House runs for re-election this year, reports that she's raked in over $1.3 million during the January-March first quarter of fundraising.
title: Trump-backed Cheney primary challenger Hageman hauls in over $1.3 million past three months

sentence: Thiel, a close Trump ally, earlier this year held a fundraiser for Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, who is running to unseat GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, an outspoken Trump critic.
title: Vance parlays Trump endorsement into new Thiel money

sentence: Trump has been especially annoyed, one ally said, that the Club has not endorsed or lent assistance to Wyoming congressional hopeful Harriet Hageman, who is challenging incumbent Rep. Liz Cheney in one of the former President's highest-profile efforts to oust his foes inside the GOP.
author: Gabby Orr
title: Trump unleashes his temper on GOP allies over Ohio Senate primary split

sentence: It was not clear why Mr. Trump considered Mr. McIntosh to be by his side in that fight, since he has previously been frustrated that the Club has not endorsed Harriet Hageman, who is challenging Ms. Cheney.
title: A big G.O.P. group amplifies its attacks on a Trump-backed Ohio candidate.

sentence: And two congressional challengers whom Thiel has also supported -- Joe Kent in Washington and Harriet Hageman in Wyoming -- have mounted competitive bids against incumbent Republicans who voted to impeach former President Trump.
author: Gabby Orr and Michael Warren
title: Peter Thiel plans to wind down his involvement in 2022 after Vance's victory in Ohio

sentence: And perhaps most prominently in Wyoming, Rep. Liz Cheney (R) is in the fight for her political life in a primary against Trump-backed attorney Harriet Hageman later in August.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Pro-Trump candidates look to harness populist energy after Ohio
